name: Get That Bread! (pjheric, Ziln00bas, TimKashani, Oswenn)
name_original: Get That Bread! (pjheric, Ziln00bas, TimKashani, Oswenn)
description:
UCI VGDC 2021 PROTO GAME JAM (FALL) SUBMISSION 

A combination of two minigames about a cute Dough Boi claiming his destiny. 

We open upon Dough Boi's coronation, where he receives the Holy Breadstick to rule the Bakery-- but the Dough Monster, his estranged brother and second-in-line to the throne-- breaks the Breadstick in half in a fit of jealous rage!

Dough Boi must get creative to restore his royal heirloom and become the rightful heir. Collect the ingredients for the bread, then protect the oven from the merciless attacks of the Dough Monster. Get that bread!

Credits

Nathan Lacsamana - Producer / Programmer

Zoi Meaders - Artist

Tim Kashani - Programmer / Audio

Eric Park - Designer

Michael Shaneman - Producer / UI/UX

Controls

Mouse left click to interact with UI elements

Arrow keys/WASD to move around in stage 1

Up and down arrows/WS keys to move up and down in stage 2

Unsung Ballad of our Heroic Dough Boi

Is this the real rye? 

Is this just fantasy? 

Caught in the dough rise 

Can't escape from cereal-ity

I'm just a Dough Boi... nobody loves me 

He's just a Dough Boi from the Dough Family 

Spare him his life from Dough Monstrosity
